name: Dice Tactics (WIP)
description:
The original version of this game made during GMTK Jam can be played here

This project is in active development. Some features are missing or incomplete.

HOW TO PLAY

Each character starts with a pool of dice which will be used to act during battle.

Place your dice on character slots to get access to basic actions and affect attributes for the turn:
- SPIRIT: Get a temporary Shield (blocks N incoming damage)
- AGILITY: Move up to N tiles
- POWER: Activate a basic attack for N damage (range 1)

Use specific color or number combinations to activate advanced skills and items.

CLASS TALENT (not implemented yet)
Change the outcome of the dice once per round for every character: the warrior can increase or decrease a value, the ranger can reroll a die, the mage can change a face color. Drag dice on the talent icons to activate.
